sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import NavBar from './NavBar' import {useState} from 'react' import './Create.css' function CreatePost({addNewPost}) { const defaultObj = { image: "", caption: "" } const [form, setForm] = useState(defaultObj) const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() addNewPost(form) setForm(defaultObj) } const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } return ( <>
) } export default CreatePost
